title: cmd/goimports: "false remove" tagged imports
body:
by **lk4d4math**: 
For example with gopkg.in packages.

Using goimports on attached file:
goimports -d test.go
diff test.go gofmt/test.go
--- /tmp/gofmt608087568 2014-05-06 08:09:30.332914932 +0400
+++ /tmp/gofmt044750895 2014-05-06 08:09:30.332914932 +0400
@@ -1,9 +1,6 @@
 package pg_test
 
-import (
-       "fmt"
-       "gopkg.in/pg.v1"
-)
+import "fmt"
 
 type User struct {
        Name   string
Attachments: 1. test.go (1137 bytes)
